item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

have you tried adding this to either itemassistant or combatassistant? this also does not have an effect. This is just saying if player has this item id then it’s considered verac.

item.title: How to add veracs special ability [PI]
item.dc:creator: @pkufast pkufast
item.description:
@pkufast wrote:

Okay i tried it by myself, like 5 times, changing things, and i still get errors. I was wondering if someone could tell me where the code should go. I am pretty sure im correct on where i’m putting it. But idk. Help would be great.

I already got this code down with no errors.
But what is the next code i have to do? I cant figure it out lol.

public boolean fullVeracs() { return c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] == 4753 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerChest] == 4757 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerLegs] == 4759 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4755; }

Read full topic
